title: I'm about to reach 1000 normal wins, any Rioters able to party up for my 1000th win?
body:
Hello!

I am about to reach 1000 wins on my profile and I was wondering in tradition if any Reds could join me to celebrate 1000 wins that would be amazing! :)

{{champion:432}} Thanks!

replies.body:
I'm keen to play =D

what time are you usually on?

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=T1I9KFvR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-08T04:38:34.711+0000)
>
> I'm keen to play =D
> 
> what time are you usually on?

I'll be on around 12 - 4 AEDT tomorrow, and Thursday I will be busy with exam study but Friday will be around the same. Also thank you very much! It's greatly appreciated! :)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
lets play a game at 2pm AEDT today. Add me in game =D

http://i.imgur.com/6XiFl3i.png

Thanks for the game mate! ty for the carry.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=T1I9KFvR,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-11-09T03:36:30.318+0000)
>
> http://i.imgur.com/6XiFl3i.png
> 
> Thanks for the game mate! ty for the carry.

Risky pick considering the assassin meta.
I may not be a Rioter, but I am a God among mere mortals. Playing with me is a privilege not many are able to ever accomplish. I sneeze and the entire world blesses me.
